page.title: 05HOUSING IN NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: In this area owner-occupied semi-detatched villas predominate. There are also detached villas of various styles and single storey bungalows. These are of traditional brick cavity wall construction with slated or tiled roofs. A small percentage consists of local authority housing. These houses rented to people who do not wish, or are unable, to own their own house. The majority of houses in Newton Mearns were built prior to 1939 but since 1946 there has been a large increase in the number of houses built for sale. In recent years new housing estates have been built on former farm land.
